text:
@GavinNewsom People in Shasta County aren't wearing masks. Gatherings are common. There is no enforcement of business guidelines 
The cases of Covid-19 doubled in the first 3 weeks of June. 
Tourists are arriving because city papers are touting "See California"
I'm looking at you @SFGate
